definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: With algebraic multi-grid method(AMG), linear system of equations are solved.
sentences.chinese: 利用代数多重网格法求解了这个线性代数方程组。

sentences.english: You do need to have very good linear algebra skills.
sentences.chinese: 你需要有很好的线性代数技能。

sentences.english: The reader is assumed to know calculus and a little linear algebra.
sentences.chinese: 假定读者了解微积分和线性代数一点。

sentences.english: Linear algebra content is more abstract, logic is stronger.
sentences.chinese: 线性代数内容比较抽象，逻辑性比较强。

sentences.english: The discretized tri-diagonal linear algebraic equations are solved with ADI method.
sentences.chinese: 离散后的三对角线性代数方程组用ADI方法求解。

definition: calculus/differentiation and integration/calculus of infinitesimals 微 and integrals 積|积
further math/advanced mathematics (school subject, abbr. for 高等數學|高等数学)
